label: 天長印信
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: てんちょう いんじん
説明文: An important document purportedly bestowed by Kukai to his disciples, which came to symbolize the transmission of the most important mantras and mudras of Shingon Buddhism.
